item.description:
For June, we will meet on June 12th instead of the first Saturday of the month (June 5th). We are having a Grand Re-Opening Party to celebrate the renovations of our center. Our renovations include a new "Pet Lodge" complete with new indoor/outdoor doggy suites, a new Kitty City, and a new indoor/outdoor (& fenced) Doggy Daycamp!

For this meetup group, we will be meeting in our brand new fenced in yard at the same scheduled time; only this time we will have even more activities going on. As always, the dogs need to be up to date with their vaccines in order to play. Hope everyone can come and feel free to bring guests!


Check out our blog for more updates on our renovations: www.bestfriendsbethany.blogspot.com

group.name: The Bethany Friendly Dog Meetup Group

item.name: Grand Re-Opening Party
